plot: A documentary of World War I, exploring how soldiers accepted their conditions in the trenches when no clear reason had been given for the fight.
title: 14-18, le bruit et la fureur

plot_en: A documentary of World War I, exploring how soldiers accepted their conditions in the trenches when no clear reason had been given for the fight.
